summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1737, for the improvement of West Fifty-eighth Street, from Twentieth Avenue Northwest to Twenty-fourth Avenue Northwest, by regrading the roadway to conform with the existing curb, under Ordinance No. 18437 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
